title: 242nd Battalion, CEF
text: The 242nd Battalion, CEF was a unit in the <a href="Canadian%20Expeditionary%20Force">Canadian Expeditionary Force</a> during the First World War. Based in <a href="Montreal">Montreal</a>, <a href="Quebec">Quebec</a>, the unit began recruiting sometime in mid-1916 in Montreal and the surrounding district. The unit was absorbed into the <a href="Canadian%20Forestry%20Corps">Canadian Forestry Corps</a> while still in Canada. The 242nd Battalion, CEF had one Officer Commanding: Lieut-Col. J. B. White.
